attributes.action: ensure that British born applicants get priority to social housing than immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Peterborough there are over 8000 people on the waiting list for social housing. Not enough homes are being built to cater for them yet immigrants get priority over british born citizens. This has to stop. We want the government to force new rules on local councils to make sure that british born citizens get housed first.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
